name: Medusa's Garden
description:
Medusa's Garden is a co-op puzzle game that requires the players to communicate with each other in order to progress.

Setup: Two Players, two laptops/computers

There are two different game files, Perseus and Medusa. One player will set up Perseus on one computer and the other player will set up Medusa.

The original intention for the game is that players are forbidden to look at each others screen but are allowed to communicate to each other.
